name: Container

fields.name: height
fields.description: The height of the component’s container. The unit property determines the unit of measurement, in pixels or percent.

fields.name: isContainerAutoSizeEnabled
fields.description: If set to true, stacked console components in the sidebars autosize vertically.

fields.name: region
fields.description: The location of the component’s container (right, left, bottom, top).

fields.name: sidebarComponents
fields.description: Represents a specific custom console component to display in the components’ container.

fields.name: style
fields.description: The style of the container in which to display multiple components (stack, tab, accordion).

fields.name: unit
fields.description: The unit of measurement, in pixels or percent, for the height or width of the components’ container.

fields.name: width
fields.description: The width of the component’s container. The unit property determines the unit of measurement, in pixels or percent.

methods.name: clone
methods.description: Makes a duplicate copy of the Metadata.Container.

description: Represents a location and style in which to display more than one custom console component in the sidebars of the console.
